breakpoint.type: xs | sm | md | lg | xl | xxl
breakpoint.description_zh: 触发响应式布局的断点

:collapsedWidth.description: Shrink the width, set to 0 and a special trigger will appear
:collapsedWidth.description_zh: 收缩宽度，设置为 0 会出现特殊 trigger

collapsible.description: Whether it can be stowed away

defaultCollapsed.description: Whether it is collapsed by default

reverseArrow.description: Flips the direction of the collapse cue arrow, which can be used when the Sider is on the right
reverseArrow.description_zh: 翻转折叠提示箭头的方向，当 Sider 在右边时可以使用

:trigger.description: Customize the trigger, which is hidden when set to null
:trigger.description_zh: 自定义 trigger，设置为 null 时隐藏 trigger

:zeroWidthTriggerStyle.description: Specifies the style of a special trigger that appears when collapsedWidth is 0
:zeroWidthTriggerStyle.description_zh: 指定当 collapsedWidth 为 0 时出现的特殊 trigger 的样式

events.name: onBreakpoint
events.description: Click the search icon, the clear icon, or the callback when you press enter
events.description_zh: 点击搜索图标、清除图标，或按下回车键时的回调

events.name: onCollapse
events.description: The callback function when expanding-collapsing can be triggered in two ways: click trigger and reactive feedback
events.description_zh: 展开-收起时的回调函数，有点击 trigger 以及响应式反馈两种方式可以触发
